thread.title: Tequila Tuesday chases away the Mondays (13 Photos)
thread.title_full: Tequila Tuesday chases away the Mondays (13 Photos)

author: Dustin
title: Tequila Tuesday chases away the Mondays (13 Photos)
text:
1/2 oz. Grand Marnier liqueur 1/2 oz. ginger simple syrup fresh limes for garnish coarse salt for the rim 
Instructions: Before serving, rim the edge of the glass with a lime slice and then dip it in coarse salt to coat. Fill the glass with just a few ice cubes. Add the ginger beer, lime juice, tequila, grand marnier and simple syrup to a shaker with ice and gently shake to combine. Pour over ice and squeeze in a few extra lime wedges. 4 
I am including the batch recipe for this because Mimosas. Thatâ€™s all. Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups orange juice 1 1/2 cups pineapple juice 1 cup Blanco Tequila 1/4 cup grenadine syrup 
Instructions: Using a pitcher, mix orange and pineapple juice. Pour tequila and orange juice into champagne flutes, topped with grenadine, allowing it to settle. Serve immediately. 5
